reviewText: This is a short story of how Christians are abused in many places simply for loving God and His Word.
This powerful true story is exactly what modern young people need to see.  God deserves our whole life, not just part.

This is a great film to use in the classroom. Whether you are teaching about communism in the Soviet Union, the Cold War or about our freedoms by living in democracy this will help students realize how different Nikolai's life is from their own. I am so happy to have found this movie to use in my classroom.
I love this film. It's very edifying to the faith. Nikolai's courage will inspire every believer to stand firm for the Lord, no matter what the circumstances.
